ResearchProjectDef.label: Portal Gun basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grants the ability to craft Portal Guns which allow for instantaneous travel between two points but come with a hefty power requirement to use.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic modules
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables the research into basic Portal Gun modules which can improve the device in minor ways. Also allows 1 module to be added to any Portal Gun.

ResearchProjectDef.label: intermediate modules
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables the research into intermediate Portal Gun modules which can improve the device in significant ways. Also allows an additional module to be added to any Portal Gun, up to two modules per device.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced modules
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables the research into advanced Portal Gun modules which can improve the device in major ways. Also allows an additional module to be added to any Portal Gun, up to three modules per device.

ResearchProjectDef.label: battery module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft the battery module, which increases the power capacity of any Portal Gun its added to.

ResearchProjectDef.label: power efficiency module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft the power efficiency module, which reduces the power draw of any Portal Gun its added to.

ResearchProjectDef.label: improved surface module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft the improved surface module, which allows portals to be placed on roughly hewn surfaces at the cost of an additional power draw.

ResearchProjectDef.label: GLaDOS module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft the GLaDOS module, which tunes the Portal Gun to run more lean, shoot further and with much greater accuracy and prevents solar flares from affecting it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: vanometric power module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft the vanometric power module, which allows a Portal Gun to generate its own power to maintain its portals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced surface module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft the advanced surface module, which allows portals to be placed on nearly any surface at the cost of an additional power draw when placed on more difficult to maintain surfaces.
